arts.ttl: The five key battles that could win or lose the game for Milan against Bari
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan get their 2025-26 season underway tonight at San Siro as they welcome Bari in the Coppa Italia round of 32. arts.ttl: AC Milan – Bari: the possible lineups | Coppa Italia fixture
arts.sum: For tonight’s match against Bari at the San Siro stadium, valid for the Coppa Italia competition, round of 32, Massimiliano Allegri will have his entire squad available, except for third-choice goalkeeper Lorenzo Torriani, who is sidelined with a finger injury picked up during training this week. arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan will be up against Bari in the Coppa Italia tonight and according to a report, Max Allegri will give Davide Bartesaghi the chance from start. arts.sum: By: Isak Möller AC Milan are getting ready to start their 2025-26 season with the Coppa Italia clash against Bari tonight. arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Allegri revives Milan, and the push from 66.000 at the debut vs Bari
arts.sum: Milan want to start at Max. Even if Max (Allegri) won’t actually be on the bench, suspended after being sent off in the 2023–24 Coppa Italia final (won with Juventus against Atalanta). In his place, giving instructions to the Rossoneri will be his trusted assistant Marco Landucci, alongside the 58-year-old coach since their days at […]
